title: How can anyone check to see that their driving license is fake or real? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are about 195 countries in the world. Each will probably have their own licencing authority. Some, like Australia, Canada and the USA issue driving licences at a province/territory/state level. So to know how to identify a duplicate licence (if indeed there is a difference) you would need to identify which licencing authority issued the licence. Without knowing that any answer can only be guesswork.

How do I spot a fake driver’s license? There are several ways to do it. The features of a license vary from state to state. Use a black light. Each state will have some kind of logo that is visible under black light. A fake one will either not have the logo, or a shoddy version of the real one, since it is difficult to replicate. (This is the easiest way, and I would recommend any establishment needing age verification to carry one.)Look at the micro printing. Most licenses have small lettering that may look like lines under a normal eye, but with a magnifying lens, the letters become visible.Most licenses are double laminated. If a license feels too thin, it probably is fake.After seeing multiple licenses, you get a general idea of how text and pictures are supposed to align. A misalignment on any of them screams fake license.Hope this helps.

Did you apply for a driving licence? Did you take driving lessons? Did you take a driving test? Did you pass the driving test? Does your driving licence have your correct name and details on it? Is the driving licence in date? I can say I have never been convicted of a driving offence where my driving licence rights have been removed. If you answered YES to all these questions then the chances are that your licence is valid. To check just call the issuing authority.

My guess is if you have to ask on social media it’s probably not. But first look at your drivers license, you should recognize the picture, address and DOB. Are they you and is it where you live? Next look at the expiration date, it should not be that date yet. Finally did you do anything that would get your driving privileges removed? If you still are not sure you can go to the DMV and ask them.

I would cast my mind back to taking my test. If I remembered taking it, then I'd be sure my driving licence is kosher. And if I had not recently had a head trauma or brain surgery and could not remember taking my test I would work out its fake. A cop, on the other hand, wouldn't need to have actually seen you taking a test. He would merely check it via radio or in car internet and would thereby know you'd bought it at some 10 bucks forgers shop.

Call the DMV at 800 777 0133 and once you verify your information, they can tell you if your license is current, expired, suspended, or revoked. They cannot tell you if you have points on your record, and they can only tell you information about YOUR driving record, nobody else's.

Go to the nearest branch of the DMV and ask them. As long as you have valid identification, they will tell you. My suspicion is that, because you have to wonder if your license is valid, it’s probably not. You may as well bite the bullet and go and see what you need to do to get reinstated. It’s going to be a lot cheaper than a driving under suspension charge, trust me.

Step 1: Go to Direct Link to https://parivahan.gov.in/parivahan/ Step 2: In Sarthi Parivahan Website >> Menu "Online Service" >> "Know Your Licence Details"  Step 3: The website will go after opening. Enter the Driving Licence Number here first. Then fill your date of birth and fill the verification code and select the check status option.

In the US, licenses are issued by a state authority, (Secretary of State, Dept of Motor Vehicles, etc). They all require some form(s) of ID prior to issuing a license. If you have to ask, it probably means you didn't get the license from the state authority, which probably means it's a fake.

If you are an India you should download m parivahan app and type your license number if your license is original you will find your data if you won’t found data it means your license is fake and your license must not issue before 2010 Thanks

Someone wants to borrow your car but won’t show you their driver’s license? Then the answer is “No, you may not use my car.” It’s on them to provide you proof that they’re licensed and insured. Do not go out of your way to do their job for them. Besides, it’s most likely that if they won’t show you that they don’t have one. Better safe than sorry.
Go onto DMV of your area/state, click on DL check….the rest is self explanatory.
Upvote now and thank me Later
